CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Book Flight stage positioned above or below the View Destination Info stage?
SRP.A: The Book Flight stage is positioned {below} the View Destination Info stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Travel to Destination?
VE.A: The value of stage Travel to Destination is {579}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Search Travel Packages?
VE.A: The value of stage Search Travel Packages is {1969}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage View Destination Info?
VE.A: The value of stage View Destination Info is {2610}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is View Destination Info, with a value of {2610}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Check-in at Hotel, with a value of {480}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage View Destination Info to stage Search Travel Packages?
SC.A: Decreased by {641} Thousand Tourists from stage View Destination Info to stage Search Travel Packages.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 1194? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {View Destination Info} stage has {2610}, the {Search Travel Packages} stage has {1969}, the {Select Accommodation} stage has {1421}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 773? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Travel to Destination} stage has {579}, the {Check-in at Hotel} stage has {480}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 773 and 1194? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Book Flight} stage has {968}, the {Make Reservation} stage has {967}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination, or from stage View Destination Info to Search Travel Packages?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Destination Info} to {Search Travel Packages} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Book Flight to Make Reservation, or from stage Make Reservation to Travel to Destination?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Make Reservation} to {Travel to Destination} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Select Accommodation to Book Flight, from stage Search Travel Packages to Select Accommodation, or from stage View Destination Info to Search Travel Packages?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {View Destination Info} to stage {Search Travel Packages} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {View Destination Info} and {Search Travel Packages} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Book Flight} and {Make Reservation} stages.
